Caption: Dignitaries having refreshments, possibly at the Institute Guest House, now known as ‘Bose-Einstein Guest House’
Description: From left (table behind, facing camera): Dr. E. Hohmann, internal member of the Senate, Dr. R. J. H. Bisanz, internal member of the Senate and Dr. K. A. V. Pandalai, internal member of the Senate. In front of Dr. Bisanz, on the same table (face turned left), is Dr. G. S. Laddha, Director, A. C. College of Technology, Madras. On the table near the camera (facing camera) is dignitary (yet to be identified), Prof. S. Sampath, Department of Electrical Engineering, Mr. C. V. Sethunathan, Registrar and Security Officer Mr. T. N. Venkataraman in his white uniform (with hand on chin, looking down).
